metadata.title: CVE-2022-27447 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: MariaDB Server v10.9 and below was discovered to contain a use-after-free via the component Binary_string::free_buffer() at /sql/sql_string.h.

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.5 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
